title: Excellent

title: Delightful
review:
Full Review:
Ordered on 29th of May Got Delivery By 30th May One Day Delivery This is the Most Admirable Thing in Flikpkart and I Should Say Thank You!! I Bought This Mobile For My Sister  She's Not a Techie Or Gamer But She Need a Mobile With Decent Specs With Brand Value Like Samsung So I Decided To Go For It!!
Writing Review After Using 15 Days

Box Contents:
Handset
Adapter 0.5V to 1A
USB Cable 
Earphones
NFC Sticker
Some Papers (Manuals)

PROS:
Camera 8+5 
Quad-core Processor 
Amoled Display
Battery 2600 MAH
2 GB RAM (1.8 GB Free)
16 ROM(12.5GB Free)
Price

CONS:
Displays Isn't That Much Sharp as 720p Amoled Its Bit Dull and In Some Angle Black Shadow Visible Even Though It Has 291 PPI.
There's No Marshmallow It's Running on Lollipop Only.
Rear & Selfie Both Cameras Clarity Isn't Great!
No Front Flash
No Snapdragon Chipset
Conclusion: If You Looking For a Mobile Under 8K With Limited Specs and With Brand Value Simply Go For It You'll Never Regret!!!

IF YOU FOUND THIS REVIEW USEFULL DON'T HIT LIKE

title: Worth the money
review:
Genuine Review after a usage of more than 2 months.

Samsung J3 Pro.
Best budget phone for the one who doesn't want to spend more money on a phone.

-------------------------
KEY FEATURES
-------------------------

• 2 GB RAM | 16 GB ROM | Expandable Upto 128 GB
• 5 inch HD Display
• 8MP Rear Camera | 5MP Front Camera
• 2600 mAh Battery
• Spreadtrum Quad Core 1.5GHz Processor
• 1.5 GHz Quad Core

----------
PROS
----------
Brilliant Display
Attractive Design
Great Camera 📷
Good Battery Backup
Storage 

----------
CONS
----------
No Backlight
No Notification light
Low Volume
Little bit laggy if storage is almost full.

-------------------------
FINAL VERDICT
-------------------------
Though there are some cons but still one can buy the phone as the phone has good features.
If you have a budget around 8k and want a Samsung phone then this is the phone one should go for.

If my Review helped you to decide which phone to buy then please do give a thumbs up 👍

Thanks!
